fields.content:
This is a fun challenge between friends to see how can pick each week a football game that does no end up nil nil.

All player are required to Register to play. Then to pick a team, before the day of the matches. See the rules for further details.
fields.title: Welcome to NoNilNil.com

fields.content:
1. Brendan reasonable judgement is final.
  2. This is not gambling - When The Fun Stops Stop!
  3. Pick a game involving a franchise club and you lose.
  4. To stay in you must pick a team that player and the game does not end-up nil nil.
    1. Postponed games count as nil nil.
    1. Re-arranged games before the date count as nil nil, blame sky not me,
  5. Rounds continue until there is a week where one and only one players avoids a nil nil.
    1. If all the remaining player fail to avoid a nil nil, there is a roll-over in to the next game,

      The game is on again
fields.title: Rules - Rules must be obeyed, The judges will decide.

fields.content:
A crazy idea, plagiarised from a number of sources

Written using the Django framework with lots of python, currently running at Pythonanywhere.com

Contact: Via twitter @bmsleight
